channel.title: Exp rate
channel.description: how to i change my exp rate? i set very low i i dont know how to change it

item.title: Exp rate
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

Go on your server with a test account, then attack something and when you hit a 1, look at your stats and see how much xp you gained from that 1, then go to you client.java and search for the number of xp you got from that 1 hit, till you find something like } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(Your xp rate here*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
or something that says FighType or UseBow or UseCrossbow, change where in the code above says your xp rate here, but on your client.java it says a number change the number to what ever xp you want, and change the others to.

Read full topic

item.title: Exp rate
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

Go in your client file. Control+F>addSkillXP . Then you’ll see a number. Mine was 5000, So I changed to 1000, because 5000 xp per damage was a lil too high… So just change the number to whatever you want it to be, then keep changing the xp rates… Save compile, run.

Read full topic
